verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi tabe cintā pāilā mane
bhakta-gaṇa lañā vicāra kailā āra dine

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; tabe—thereafter; cintā—an anxiety or thought; pāilā mane—got in his mind; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—among all the devotees; vicāra kailā—considered; āra dine—the next day.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara was very anxious, but then he had an idea. The following day, he and the other devotees considered it together.
